data_table.description: Retinal Examination Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: REXB1
variable.description: When was the last time you saw a doctor, optometrist, or eye specialist concerning your vision? Q1 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]
variable.value: At least 1 year but less than 2 years
At least 2 years but less than 3 years

variable.name: REXB2A
variable.description: Has your doctor ever told you that you had diabetes? Q2A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB2B
variable.description: Has your doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of diabetes? Q2B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB2C
variable.description: Has your doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of diabetes? Which eye or eyes were affected? Q2C [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB2D
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for diabetes? Q2D [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB2E
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for diabetes? On which eye or eyes? Q2E [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB3A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of glaucoma, or increased pressure inside one or both of your eyes? Q3A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB3B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of glaucoma, or increased pressure inside one or both of your eyes? Which eye or eyes were affected? Q3B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB4A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of age-related macular degeneration? Q4A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB4B
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of age-related macular degeneration? Which eye or eyes were affected? Q4B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB4C
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for macular degeneration? Q4C [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB4D
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for macular degeneration? On which eye or eyes? Q4D [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB5A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of cataract, or cloudiness of the lens, in one or both of your eyes? Q5A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB5B
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for macular degeneration? Which eye or eyes were affected? Q5B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB5C
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery because of cataracts? Q5C [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB5D
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery because of cataracts? On which eye or eyes? Q5D [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB6A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of blockage of an artery or vein in one or both of your eyes? Q6A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB6B
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery because of cataracts? Which eye or eyes were affected? Q6B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB6C
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for this blockage? Q6C [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB6D
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on your eyes for this blockage? On which eye or eyes? Q6D [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB7A
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery for another condition? Q7A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB7B
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery for another condition? What was the condition? Q7B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB7C
variable.description: Have you ever had eye surgery for another condition? On which eye or eyes? Q7C [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB8A
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on Your eyes for another condition? Q8A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB8B
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on Your eyes for another condition? What was the condition? Q8B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB8C
variable.description: Have you ever had laser treatments on Your eyes for another condition? On which eye or eyes? Q8C [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB9A
variable.description: Are you completely blind in one or both eyes? Q9A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB9B
variable.description: Are you completely blind in one or both eyes? In which eye? Q9B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB10A
variable.description: Have you ever had an eye removed? Q10A [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB10B
variable.description: Have you ever had an eye removed? Which eye was removed? Q10B [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB11
variable.description: Type of eye selection? Q11 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB12
variable.description: Which eye was photographed? Q12 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXB13
variable.description: Reason for not photographing? Q13 [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXBFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: REXBCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Retinal Examination Form, exam 4]
